title: How to get apps on your smart TV that didn't come loaded with - Quora

response.answer_text: Some Smart TVs have an App Store on them. This is where you can download additional apps. Some don't and you are stuck with what you have. I just hook up a computer or my smartphones (usually iPhones) to the TV and just play through the HDMI port. Any apps I want to use or watch videos from plays on the TV. There are set top boxed and such like a Roku, Chromecast, Android set top box, Apple TV and so on that will do the same.
